item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Lissa Price
item.description: "No one ever complained about a fat brain. No one ever accused their brain of being too short or too tall, too wide or too narrow. Or ugly. It either worked or it didn't, and mine worked just fine." -- Lissa Price

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "I have a theory that selflessness and bravery aren't all that different." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "It must require bravery to be honest all the time." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "I might be in love with you." He smiles a little. "I'm waiting until I'm sure to tell you, though." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Lauren Oliver
item.description: "I love you. Remember. They cannot take it" -- Lauren Oliver

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Lauren Oliver
item.description: "You can't be happy unless you're unhappy sometimes"." -- Lauren Oliver

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "People, I have discovered, are layers and layers of secrets. You believe you know them, that you understand them, but their motives are always hidden from you, buried in their own hearts. You will never know them, but sometimes you decide to trust them." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "No matter how long you train someone to be brave, you never know if they are or not until something real happens." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "It reminds me why I chose Dauntless in the first place: not because they are perfect, but because they are alive. Because they are free." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Lauren Oliver
item.description: "The flip side of freedom is this: When you're completely free, you're also completely on your own." -- Lauren Oliver

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "I can’t leave now. I like her too much. There, I said it. But I won’t say it again." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Alyson Noel
item.description: "You never know what you have till you've lost it." -- Alyson Noel

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Alyson Noel
item.description: "Hating requires caring. In which case, I couldn't possibly hate you." -- Alyson Noel

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Christine Fonseca
item.description: "Do it, Nesy. Say the words. Pierce my heart. Send me to the Abyss and end my suffering. Please. I won’t stop you." -- Christine Fonseca

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Christine Fonseca
item.description: "There are few things I hate more than feeling weak. Needing help or failing top the list. The worst, however, is knowing that all three just happened." -- Christine Fonseca

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Christine Fonseca
Nickle Love add a quote by Christine Fonseca
item.description: "There is no point in thinking of what could've been; no point in belaboring the past." -- Christine Fonseca

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Karen Amanda Hooper
item.description: "If you love someone, put their name in a circle; because hearts can be broken, but circles never end." -- Karen Amanda Hooper

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Karen Amanda Hooper
item.description: "Beauty is sometimes hidden under a veil of tragedy." -- Karen Amanda Hooper

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Karen Amanda Hooper
item.description: "Love until it kills you, because there's nothing better worth dying for." -- Karen Amanda Hooper

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Anna Banks
item.description: "Galen?” “Hmm?” “You can put me down now.” “I’m not ready yet.” He tightens his hold. “You don’t have to hold—“ “Emma? Can you hear me?” “Uh, yes. I can hear fine. I just can’t see—“ “That’s a relief. Because for a minute there, I thought maybe you didn’t hear me when I said I’m not ready yet.” “Jackass." -- Anna Banks

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Anna Banks
item.description: "There’s nothing wrong with your daughter, Mrs. McIntosh. I said we’re not sleeping together. I didn’t say I didn’t want to." -- Anna Banks

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "Here’s to books, the cheapest vacation you can buy." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Nickle Love add a quote by Dan Brown
item.description: "Everything is possible. The impossible just takes longer." -- Dan Brown
